channel.title: Comments on: My Experience Attending a Free-Con
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Kendra Little
item.dc:creator: Kendra Little
item.content:encoded:
Now I feel kinda bad that I’ve never hollered “It’s Grant F-ing Fritchey!!!”

But I can fix that.

item.title: By: Brent Ozar
item.dc:creator: Brent Ozar
item.content:encoded:
I’m so glad you could come! You’re a hoot, and you added a lot to the discussions.

Shelly – yeah, you’re right about someone ruining it for everyone, and that’s why I try to be really selective with the Free-Con attendee list. I only invite about a dozen people each time, and I limit to people who I’ve interacted with enough to know that they’re going to add to the event, rather than detract from it. It’s hard work!

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.content:encoded:
hah, just noticed the LTD sticker on the laptop! +1 (of something…)

did you make that?

item.title: By: Shelly Noll
item.dc:creator: Shelly Noll
item.description: The SQL Community is so kind and generous! I've done that branding exercise a couple of times now (not at SQL events) and there is always someone who decides to be passive-aggressive with their answers and ruins it for everyone. It's good to hear about a situation where it was valuable.
item.content:encoded: The SQL Community is so kind and generous! I’ve done that branding exercise a couple of times now (not at SQL events) and there is always someone who decides to be passive-aggressive with their answers and ruins it for everyone. It’s good to hear about a situation where it was valuable.

item.title: By: Bob Pusateri
item.dc:creator: Bob Pusateri
item.description: Great way to sum it up!

item.title: By: Matt Velic
item.dc:creator: Matt Velic
item.description: Grant never gets tired of people yelling, "It's Grant F-ing Fritchey!" in his face. ;-) Sounds like an awesome time, and you definitely are one of those people.
item.content:encoded: Grant never gets tired of people yelling, “It’s Grant F-ing Fritchey!” in his face. üòâ Sounds like an awesome time, and you definitely are one of those people.

item.title: By: Grant Fritchey
item.dc:creator: Grant Fritchey
item.content:encoded:
You were so quiet the first half of the day I was thinking, “Wow, she’s nothing like I expected.” Don’t worry, you fixed it.

Good word choice too.
